name: Aurelia Workshop in London
description: Great news if you live in or around London! I'll be presenting a two-day workshop on "Developing Modern Applications with Aurelia" on March 31st and April 1st.
content:
Great news if you live in or around London! I'll be presenting a two-day workshop on "Developing Modern Applications with Aurelia" on March 31st and April 1st.

To learn more about the course or book your ticket, please visit [the event page](https://www.learningconnexions.com/courses/developing-modern-applications-with-aurelia-with-rob-eisenberg/371). I'm looking forward to it and hope to see you there!
